author: Matt Elliott
description: TorGuard is a great VPN with a ton of servers and blistering ping performance. But it's tougher to recommend for general web browsing.
title: TorGuard VPN Review - IGN

author: Matt Elliott
description: VyperVPN is one of the fastest VPNs we've tested and has a polished, easy-to-use Windows app too.
title: VyprVPN Review - IGN

author: Matt Elliott
description: PureVPN is full-featured, reliable, and fast. Gamers looking for a solid VPN should give it a close look.
title: PureVPN Review  - IGN
